mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, BILL_ID, USER_ID, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_AT, SIDE FROM comments WHERE BILL_ID = #{billId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
